description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Qoccer can be described as "the turn-based cube soccer simulator". In Qoccer, players are cubic and movement is realistic but set during each player turn.  Games can be played against the CPU or another human. Over grass or ice. Weird, different, fun, perfectly art directed for the gameplay.
